page.title: 11SMALLHOLDING IDYLL,ST.ALLEN.
page.content: Mr.& Mrs.C. moved from Surrey 6 months ago,to Ventontrissick,an attractive timber-built house which replaced an old fire-damaged stone cottage 17 years ago.The 11.75 acres in a secluded valley include several large tanks supplied from a brook,and stocked with about 2,000 trout;these, bought with the house,are not a commercially viable enterprise so are fed (at considerable expense) until well-grown,then put into a lake to be caught by fly-fishing.The owners are still "feeling their way" with their land,keeping a goat,2 Shetland ponies, 3 dogs,geese,chickens & guinea-fowl. Mrs.C.runs a business at the modern Threemilestone Industrial estate near Truro.Mr.& Mrs.C.aim to enjoy the peace and seclusion of Ventontrissick, in company with their animals.
